Namo:
The Valley of Dragons has its regions, and its southern part is much more dangerous North.
For a start, You are better off in a less dangerous area of the North, to deal with the undead and the Dragon Clan. Head North of the Valley of Dragons and kill the following monsters: Gymnodraco, Dragon-gargoyle, Black Dragon, emerald Dragon, Sand Dragon, The Leader Of The Suicide Squad, A Minion Of The Suicide Squad, Cave Servant Of The Arrows, Cave Servant Warrior, Metal Cave Servant, Iron Cave Servant and Headless Knight. Just 100 enemies.
I think before taking any measures, it is better to eliminate a constant source of danger.
